name: Boxing MMA: Anime Fight
description:
Are you a passionate lover of fighting games? Then this game is made exactly for you! Check our new Boxing MMA: Anime Fight game and choose your perfect anime character to defeat your cute opponents and become the real legend of this kawaii tournament! Perform different martial arts and wrest the victory from the grasp of your rivals!

Don’t think that these sweet Japanese girls are inoffensive – in fact they are really brutal and mighty fighters, who can kick the spirit out of your body in a flash! So don’t let them do it in first, attack right here and right now! Unleash all your super fury to beat them all up! Master your battling skills, strike them exactly and perform the last blow to find yourself at the top of this awesome tournament list! Conquer this wrestling ring and become the best anime fighter ever!

Enjoy four game modes – ladder mode, where your mission is to become the first in the tournament list; battle mode, where you should fight your cruel enemies face to face; training mode, where you may train all your blows and super strikes; and survival mode, where your character should stay alive at the battlefield as long as you can! Have fun playing Boxing MMA: Anime Fight!

Earn points for each successfully defeated opponent and unlock new interesting characters to play for or power-up your current anime fighter! Try them all to choose your favorite one and make him/her really invincible! Step over the dead bodies of your charming rivals and become the boss!

Boxing MMA: Anime Fight features:
• Outstanding anime fighting contest
• Various types of nice characters to play for
• Enjoy four interesting game modes
• Amazing 3D graphics

Put on your best armor, clench your fists and unleash your fury! Dip into this fantastic anime fighting atmosphere, improve your battling skills and beat all your fantastic rivals with Boxing MMA: Anime Fight!
